resources.string: This sample size is for the range 0 – 500 ppb
This sample size is for the range 0 – 4000 ppb
Collect water sample
Collect 5 ml water sample using the provided bottle.
Collect 50 ml water sample using the provided bottle.
Collect 9.6 ml water sample using the small square container.
Fill HALF of the vial with sample water.
Open one foil packet and add powder contents to vial.
Add 10 drops of NH4+-1 reagent
Cap vial and shake rapidly for 5 seconds. Remove cap.
Wait 20 minutes. Swirl twice during the reaction period
Swirl to dissolve the reagent
Dip a strip into water and remove immediately.
Dip strip into water for 1 second.
Dip a strip in the water for at least 2 seconds and remove.
Dip a strip into water for 5 seconds and remove.
Dip the test strip into sample vial and rapidly move back and forth underwater for 15 seconds.
Dip the strip into sample and move back and forth for 30 seconds in water.
Immerse the reaction zone of the test strip in the pretreated sample (15 – 30 °C) for 1 sec
Dry off excess water. (e.g. place it on a towel)
Remove and shake excess water from test strip.
Do not shake excess water from the test strip.
Allow excess liquid to run off via the long edge of the strip onto an absorbent paper towel.
Add 1 drop of reagent K-1 on the reaction zone and allow to react for 1 min.
Follow the instructions that came with the testing kit for adding reagents
Conduct the test as per the instructions provided by the test kit.
When ready, place the strip within the black area on the color card for analysis.
Place strip onto black area on the color card.
Press Start button.
